```
1‚Üí'use client';
     2‚Üí
     3‚Üíimport { useEffect, useState } from 'react';
     4‚Üíimport { useAuth } from '@/app/context/AuthContext';
     5‚Üíimport { useRouter } from 'next/navigation';
     6‚Üíimport ReddjarTable from './components/ReddjarTable';
     7‚Üí
     8‚Üíexport default function ReddjarClient() {
     9‚Üí  const { user } = useAuth();
    10‚Üí  const router = useRouter();
    11‚Üí  const [columnPaginationControls, setColumnPaginationControls] = useState<{
    12‚Üí    ColumnPaginationBar1: () => JSX.Element | null;
    13‚Üí    ColumnPaginationBar2: () => JSX.Element | null;
    14‚Üí  } | null>(null);
    15‚Üí  const [selectedRows, setSelectedRows] = useState<Set<number>>(new Set());
    16‚Üí  const [isScrapingLinks, setIsScrapingLinks] = useState(false);
    17‚Üí  const [isScrapingCommentable, setIsScrapingCommentable] = useState(false);
    18‚Üí  const [commentableFilter, setCommentableFilter] = useState<'all' | 'yes' | 'no'>('all');
    19‚Üí  const [scrapeStatusFilter, setScrapeStatusFilter] = useState<'all' | 'success' | 'failed'>('all');
    20‚Üí
    21‚Üí  const handleScrapeLinks = async () => {
    22‚Üí    if (selectedRows.size === 0) {
    23‚Üí      alert('Please select at least one Reddit URL to scrape');
    24‚Üí      return;
    25‚Üí    }
    26‚Üí
    27‚Üí    setIsScrapingLinks(true);
    28‚Üí    try {
    29‚Üí      console.log('Scraping links for selected rows:', Array.from(selectedRows));
    30‚Üí      
    31‚Üí      const response = await fetch('/api/reddit-scraper', {
    32‚Üí        method: 'POST',
    33‚Üí        headers: {
    34‚Üí          'Content-Type': 'application/json',
    35‚Üí        },
    36‚Üí        body: JSON.stringify({
    37‚Üí          selectedUrlIds: Array.from(selectedRows)
    38‚Üí        }),
    39‚Üí      });
    40‚Üí
    41‚Üí      if (!response.ok) {
    42‚Üí        throw new Error(`HTTP error! status: ${response.status}`);
    43‚Üí      }
    44‚Üí
    45‚Üí      const result = await response.json();
    46‚Üí      
    47‚Üí      // Show results summary
    48‚Üí      const successful = result.results.filter((r: any) => r.success).length;
    49‚Üí      const totalLinks = result.results.reduce((sum: number, r: any) => sum + r.links_found, 0);
    50‚Üí      
    51‚Üí      alert(`Scraping completed!\n\nSuccessful: ${successful}/${result.results.length} URLs\nTotal links found: ${totalLinks}\n\nNote: Check browser console for detailed debug output.\nRefresh page manually to see updated table data.`);
    52‚Üí      
    53‚Üí      // Don't auto-refresh so user can see console debug output
    54‚Üí      // window.location.reload();
    55‚Üí      
    56‚Üí    } catch (error) {
    57‚Üí      console.error('Error scraping links:', error);
    58‚Üí      alert('Error occurred while scraping links: ' + (error instanceof Error ? error.message : 'Unknown error'));
    59‚Üí    } finally {
    60‚Üí      setIsScrapingLinks(false);
    61‚Üí    }
    62‚Üí  };
    63‚Üí
    64‚Üí  const handleScrapeCommentable = async () => {
    65‚Üí    if (selectedRows.size === 0) {
    66‚Üí      alert('Please select at least one Reddit URL to check commentability');
    67‚Üí      return;
    68‚Üí    }
    69‚Üí
    70‚Üí    setIsScrapingCommentable(true);
    71‚Üí    try {
    72‚Üí      console.log('üöÄ CLIENT: Checking commentability for selected rows:', Array.from(selectedRows));
    73‚Üí      
    74‚Üí      console.log('üì° CLIENT: Making API call to /api/reddit-commentable-scraper');
    75‚Üí      const response = await fetch('/api/reddit-commentable-scraper', {
    76‚Üí        method: 'POST',
    77‚Üí        headers: {
    78‚Üí          'Content-Type': 'application/json',
    79‚Üí        },
    80‚Üí        body: JSON.stringify({
    81‚Üí          selectedUrlIds: Array.from(selectedRows)
    82‚Üí        }),
    83‚Üí      });
    84‚Üí
    85‚Üí      console.log('üì® CLIENT: API response received:', {
    86‚Üí        status: response.status,
    87‚Üí        statusText: response.statusText,
    88‚Üí        ok: response.ok,
    89‚Üí        url: response.url
    90‚Üí      });
    91‚Üí
    92‚Üí      if (!response.ok) {
    93‚Üí        console.error('‚ùå CLIENT: API response not ok:', response.status, response.statusText);
    94‚Üí        const errorText = await response.text();
    95‚Üí        console.error('‚ùå CLIENT: Error response body:', errorText);
    96‚Üí        throw new Error(`HTTP error! status: ${response.status} - ${errorText}`);
    97‚Üí      }
    98‚Üí
    99‚Üí      console.log('üîÑ CLIENT: Parsing JSON response...');
   100‚Üí      const result = await response.json();
   101‚Üí      console.log('üìä CLIENT: Parsed API result:', result);
   102‚Üí      
   103‚Üí      // Show results summary
   104‚Üí      const successful = result.results.filter((r: any) => r.success).length;
   105‚Üí      const openThreads = result.results.filter((r: any) => r.success && r.is_commentable === true).length;
   106‚Üí      const closedThreads = result.results.filter((r: any) => r.success && r.is_commentable === false).length;
   107‚Üí      
   108‚Üí      alert(`Commentability check completed!\n\nSuccessful: ${successful}/${result.results.length} URLs\nOpen for comments: ${openThreads}\nClosed: ${closedThreads}\n\nNote: Check browser console for detailed debug output.\nRefresh page manually to see updated table data.`);
   109‚Üí      
   110‚Üí      // Don't auto-refresh so user can see console debug output
   111‚Üí      // window.location.reload();
   112‚Üí      
   113‚Üí    } catch (error) {
   114‚Üí      console.error('Error checking commentability:', error);
   115‚Üí      alert('Error occurred while checking commentability: ' + (error instanceof Error ? error.message : 'Unknown error'));
   116‚Üí    } finally {
   117‚Üí      setIsScrapingCommentable(false);
   118‚Üí    }
   119‚Üí  };
   120‚Üí
   121‚Üí  useEffect(() => {
   122‚Üí    if (!user) {
   123‚Üí      router.push('/login');
   124‚Üí      return;
   125‚Üí    }
   126‚Üí  }, [user, router]);
   127‚Üí
   128‚Üí  if (!user) {
   129‚Üí    return (
   130‚Üí      <div className="min-h-screen bg-gray-50 flex items-center justify-center">
   131‚Üí        <div className="text-gray-500">Loading...</div>
   132‚Üí      </div>
   133‚Üí    );
   134‚Üí  }
   135‚Üí
   136‚Üí  return (
   137‚Üí    <div className="min-h-screen bg-gray-50 flex flex-col">
   138‚Üí      {/* Header */}
   139‚Üí      <div className="bg-white border-b px-6 py-4">
   140‚Üí        <div className="flex items-center justify-between">
   141‚Üí          <div className="flex items-center space-x-6">
   142‚Üí            <h1 className="text-2xl font-bold text-gray-800">Reddit URLs Jar</h1>
   143‚Üí            
   144‚Üí            {/* Column Pagination Button Bars */}
   145‚Üí            {columnPaginationControls && (
   146‚Üí              <>
   147‚Üí                <div className="flex items-center">
   148‚Üí                  {columnPaginationControls.ColumnPaginationBar1()}
   149‚Üí                </div>
   150‚Üí                <div className="flex items-center">
   151‚Üí                  {columnPaginationControls.ColumnPaginationBar2()}
   152‚Üí                </div>
   153‚Üí              </>
   154‚Üí            )}
   155‚Üí            
   156‚Üí            {/* Scrape Links Button */}
   157‚Üí            <div className="flex items-center space-x-2">
   158‚Üí              <button
   159‚Üí                onClick={handleScrapeLinks}
   160‚Üí                disabled={isScrapingLinks || isScrapingCommentable || selectedRows.size === 0}
   161‚Üí                className={`px-4 py-2 text-sm font-medium rounded-md border transition-colors ${
   162‚Üí                  isScrapingLinks || isScrapingCommentable || selectedRows.size === 0
   163‚Üí                    ? 'bg-gray-100 text-gray-400 border-gray-200 cursor-not-allowed'
   164‚Üí                    : 'bg-blue-500 text-white border-blue-500 hover:bg-blue-600 hover:border-blue-600'
   165‚Üí                }`}
   166‚Üí              >
   167‚Üí                {isScrapingLinks ? 'Scraping...' : 'scrape links'}
   168‚Üí              </button>
   169‚Üí              
   170‚Üí              <button
   171‚Üí                onClick={handleScrapeCommentable}
   172‚Üí                disabled={isScrapingCommentable || isScrapingLinks || selectedRows.size === 0}
   173‚Üí                className={`px-4 py-2 text-sm font-medium rounded-md border transition-colors ${
   174‚Üí                  isScrapingCommentable || isScrapingLinks || selectedRows.size === 0
   175‚Üí                    ? 'bg-gray-100 text-gray-400 border-gray-200 cursor-not-allowed'
   176‚Üí                    : 'bg-green-500 text-white border-green-500 hover:bg-green-600 hover:border-green-600'
   177‚Üí                }`}
   178‚Üí              >
   179‚Üí                {isScrapingCommentable ? 'Checking...' : 'scrape is_commentable'}
   180‚Üí              </button>
   181‚Üí            </div>
   182‚Üí            
   183‚Üí            {/* is_commentable Filter */}
   184‚Üí            <div className="flex flex-col items-center">
   185‚Üí              <div className="text-black font-bold mb-1" style={{ fontSize: '16px' }}>
   186‚Üí                is_commentable
   187‚Üí              </div>
   188‚Üí              <select
   189‚Üí                value={commentableFilter}
   190‚Üí                onChange={(e) => setCommentableFilter(e.target.value as 'all' | 'yes' | 'no')}
   191‚Üí                className="px-3 py-2 text-sm border border-gray-300 rounded-md bg-white hover:bg-gray-50 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500 focus:border-blue-500"
   192‚Üí              >
   193‚Üí                <option value="all">all</option>
   194‚Üí                <option value="yes">yes</option>
   195‚Üí                <option value="no">no</option>
   196‚Üí              </select>
   197‚Üí            </div>
   198‚Üí            
   199‚Üí            {/* is_commentable_scrape_status Filter */}
   200‚Üí            <div className="flex flex-col items-center">
   201‚Üí              <div className="text-black font-bold mb-1" style={{ fontSize: '16px' }}>
   202‚Üí                is_commentable_scrape_status
   203‚Üí              </div>
   204‚Üí              <select
   205‚Üí                value={scrapeStatusFilter}
   206‚Üí                onChange={(e) => setScrapeStatusFilter(e.target.value as 'all' | 'success' | 'failed')}
   207‚Üí                className="px-3 py-2 text-sm border border-gray-300 rounded-md bg-white hover:bg-gray-50 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500 focus:border-blue-500"
   208‚Üí              >
   209‚Üí                <option value="all">All</option>
   210‚Üí                <option value="success">Success</option>
   211‚Üí                <option value="failed">Failed</option>
   212‚Üí              </select>
   213‚Üí            </div>
   214‚Üí          </div>
   215‚Üí          <div className="text-right">
   216‚Üí            <div className="text-sm text-gray-500">Table: redditurlsvat</div>
   217‚Üí            <div className="text-xs text-gray-400">Reddit SEO Tracking</div>
   218‚Üí          </div>
   219‚Üí        </div>
   220‚Üí      </div>
   221‚Üí
   222‚Üí      {/* Main Content - Full Width ReddjarTable */}
   223‚Üí      <div className="flex-1 overflow-hidden">
   224‚Üí        <ReddjarTable 
   225‚Üí          onColumnPaginationRender={setColumnPaginationControls}
   226‚Üí          selectedRows={selectedRows}
   227‚Üí          onSelectionChange={setSelectedRows}
   228‚Üí          commentableFilter={commentableFilter}
   229‚Üí          scrapeStatusFilter={scrapeStatusFilter}
   230‚Üí        />
   231‚Üí      </div>
   232‚Üí    </div>
   233‚Üí  );
   234‚Üí}
```

_**Agent (claude-sonnet-4-20250514)**_

Tool use: **Write**

```tsx
'use client';

import { useEffect } from 'react';
import { useAuth } from '@/app/context/AuthContext';
import { useRouter } from 'next/navigation';

export default function AmazonjarClient() {
  const { user } = useAuth();
  const router = useRouter();

  useEffect(() => {
    if (!user) {
      router.push('/login');
      return;
    }
  }, [user, router]);

  if (!user) {
    return (
      <div className="min-h-screen bg-gray-50 flex items-center justify-center">
        <div className="text-gray-500">Loading...</div>
      </div>
    );
  }

  return (
    <div className="min-h-screen bg-gray-50">
      <div className="container mx-auto px-4 py-6">
        {/* Blank UI - awaiting further instructions */}
        <div className="bg-white rounded-lg shadow p-6">
          <h1 className="text-2xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-4">Amazonjar</h1>
          <p className="text-gray-600">Page ready for implementation...</p>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  );
}
```

Result:

```
File created successfully at: /Users/kylecampbell/Documents/repos/localrepo-snefuru4/app/(protected)/amazonjar/pclient.tsx
```
